com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Class NamedDataQuery<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.AbstractStorageQuery<DESC,DATA>
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.NamedDataQuery<DESC,DATA>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NamedBeanQuery, NamedTupleQuery

    public class NamedDataQuery<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>
extends AbstractStorageQuery<DESC,DATA>
implements IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>
    Generic type that allows queries of ISharedData by name from the IDataStorage within the platform.
    Author:
    dawood
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NamedDataQuery(java.lang.String... names)
      Query storage for the given named data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDataMatch(DATA datum)
      Always return true, since we only care about data names, and the super class checks names for us.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NamedDataQuery

        public NamedDataQuery(java.lang.String... names)
        Query storage for the given named data.
        Parameters:
        names - may be null, in which case all data is queried.
